```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import itmodstruve0
>>> itmodstruve0(1.)
0.3364726286440384 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(-10., 10., 1000)
>>> itmodstruve0_values = itmodstruve0(x)
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, itmodstruve0_values)
>>> ax.set_xlabel(r'$x$')
>>> ax.set_ylabel(r'$\int_0^xL_0(t)\,dt$')
>>> plt.show() 
```
